---
title: "NASA Datanaut Presentation"
subtitle: "Using Default Slides"
author: "David Meza<br /> Sr. Data Scientist"
institute: "NASA - Open Innovation Program"
date: "12/16/2019"
output:
  xaringan::moon_reader:
    css: ["default", "libs/css/datanaut.css"]
    lib_dir: libs
    nature:
      titleSlideClass: ["title-slide"]
      highlightStyle: github
      highlightLines: true
      countIncrementalSlides: false
---
class: datanaut-title-slide

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
options(htmltools.dir.version = FALSE)
```

Using this **class** will creates a slide with the datanaut title at the top.

---
You will need to install `xaringan package` to use this presentation template.

Introduction to the package can be found [here](https://slides.yihui.org/xaringan/#1)

You can also look at the xaringan section of the [R Markdown The Definitive Guide](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/xaringan.html)

This section of the book dicusses [Document Templates](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/document-templates.html)
